title: Mother's Heart
description: United we stand ... divided we fall. The cunning and powerful Mogritas and his allies, like a pride of ferocious lions, maneuver and toy with the citizens of Mother, before moving in for the kill. Scattered across not one, but two worlds, Jenni and her classmates struggle to reunite for a final battle against the centuries-old shapeshifter. Can they band together in time? Or will old frictions and new threats tear them, and their adopted world, apart? Ruin or salvation, the answers lie in Mother's Heart.
author: Alan  Tucker
